text: The Men's individual pursuit competition at the 2017 World Championships was held on 14 April 2017.ScheduleStart list ==Results== ===Qualifying=== The first two racers will race for gold, the third and fourth fastest rider will race for the bronze medal.Qualifying results {| class="wikitable sortable" style="text-align:center" |- !
